title: What type of questions are you tired of answering as a BTS army? - Quora

response.answer_text: I think this will be relatable to not only armies but also other kpop fandoms. Are they Chinese? *For the last time they are KOREAN!*Why do you listen to them if you can't understand their language? *Subtitles? Also you guys listen to despacito without understanding a word right?!*Are they girls?*I-*Are they gay?*I don't know. Even if they are that's none of your business*How do you recognize them? They all look the same! *USE. YOUR. EYES.These are the questions asked by my “amazing” classmates. (Sigh). It just gets annoying when they tease me with all these questions. But I guess nothing can change their mind. Who cares? They are missing out all the fun we kpop Stans are having! Hope you liked the answer😃 (Purple 💜 you armies)
